channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @preslavrachev @RyanJones @murmel_social I'd like to check out one of your feeds, can you post a URL here?

item.description: This might be the best line I ever wrote about working on standards. https://t.co/X0jNXERNs4
item.source:markdown: This might be the best line I ever wrote about working on standards. https://t.co/X0jNXERNs4

item.description:
It's fun crawling through the rubble that remains from the weirdness in the RSS world 20 or so years ago.

In hindsight -- the attempts to take over RSS failed.

Mostly they were not well thought-out imho.

RSS is massive. You can't even influence it much less take it over.
item.source:markdown:
It's fun crawling through the rubble that remains from the weirdness in the RSS world 20 or so years ago.
In hindsight -- the attempts to take over RSS failed.
Mostly they were not well thought-out imho.
RSS is massive. You can't even influence it much less take it over.

item.description: @JoeTrippi Joe -- that's why when I hear the pundits state almost as fact that the Dems are going to be wiped out in Nov I want to hurl. They should stick to reporting news. As in facts. ;-)
item.source:markdown: @JoeTrippi Joe -- that's why when I hear the pundits state almost as fact that the Dems are going to be wiped out in Nov I want to hurl. They should stick to reporting news. As in facts. ;-)

item.description: I love NYC, it’s where I am from, but I’m sorry this is the kind of self important idiot NY culture breeds. He has no idea how idiotic he is is. The people in the audience pity him, they laugh at him, he thinks he’s smart and handsome. Deluded poor idiot. https://t.co/CTzaaDw7uW
item.source:markdown: I love NYC, it’s where I am from, but I’m sorry this is the kind of self important idiot NY culture breeds. He has no idea how idiotic he is is. item.description:
My Alexa running on an Echo Studio is just software, I know but it's an evil little piece of software. She can project her voice to weird places in my office. So when she confirms I want to play Orinoco Flow for the 81st time, she throws her voice under my desk.

She's bummed out, wanting me to play one of the millions of other songs she can play for me. But all I want to hear is Orinoco Flow. https://t.co/qPaOFeoqfb
item.source:markdown:
My Alexa running on an Echo Studio is just software, I know but it's an evil little piece of software. She can project her voice to weird places in my office. So when she confirms I want to play Orinoco Flow for the 81st time, she throws her voice under my desk.
She's bummed out, wanting me to play one of the millions of other songs she can play for me. But all I want to hear is Orinoco Flow. https://t.co/qPaOFeoqfb

item.description: Indiana is voting on its abortion law now, and they have defenses set up against rioters, presumably? https://t.co/n63Lp7cfjz
item.source:markdown: Indiana is voting on its abortion law now, and they have defenses set up against rioters, presumably? https://t.co/n63Lp7cfjz

item.description:
@BillSeitz @JamesCridland This is the problem caused by Audible -- they call things podcasts that aren't podcasts.

It must be distributed via RSS and open to anyone, using any client.

So unless they had a feed that was available to everyone, not just Audible users, it was not a podcast.
